name: Interim Measures for the Administration of Generative Artificial Intelligence Services
provider: Cyberspace Administration of China (CAC) and related ministries

contact.name: National Generative AI Service Filing Center

use_case: Sets compliance obligations for public-facing generative AI services covering training, security, and content governance.
data_summary: Requires lawful data sourcing, intellectual property protection, and mechanisms to prevent biased or harmful outputs.
compliance_materials: Security assessment filings for generative AI services
Content moderation and complaint handling procedures
monitoring: Requires ongoing algorithm optimization, manual review mechanisms, and reporting of major security incidents.
emergency_plan: Mandates emergency response plans for model failures, data leaks, and misuse of generated content.
obligations: Conduct security assessments and algorithm filings before providing public generative AI services.
Implement user authentication, content filtering, and complaint handling mechanisms.
Ensure training data complies with intellectual property and personal information laws.
penalties: Subject to rectification orders, service suspension, and fines per the Cybersecurity Law and related regulations.
